title: STAT+: Epic launches AI Charting, potentially scrambling the ambient scribe market
description: Epic Systems announced more details around its long-anticipated AI Charting feature, which may disrupt the market for ambient scribes.
content: Epic Systems announced more details around its long-anticipated AI Charting feature, which may disrupt the market for ambient scribes.
